content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” css=”.vc_custom_1647078100580{border-top-width: 8px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #ec1c24 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}” z_index=””][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”10/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647074453668{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”]

Create The Freedom To Do What You Want With a Personal Loan from Chainpay Loans

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1647074429287{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”]Are you in need of a loan but you’re blacklisted? Get your Personal Loan at the best interest rates!

Chainpay Loans is a nationwide brokerage with over 25 years of experience in the credit industry that helps clients all over South Africa to obtain PERSONAL LOANS UP TO R10 000 000.

We apply for you at our panel of lenders that are all registered with the NCR.[/vc_column_text]Read More[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1647078118638{padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”392″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”parallax” parallax_content_width=”in_grid” text_align=”left” full_screen_section_height=”no” background_image=”401″ css=”.vc_custom_1647077171267{background-color: #3f3f3f !important;}” anchor=”read-more”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1647078310024{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

What We Offer

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”21px”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647078236981{padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Competitive Interest Rates

Fixed Monthly Repayments

Hassle-Free Applications

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

Flexible Repayment Options

Variety of Loan Options

Funds Paid To Your Account

[vc_empty_space height=”90px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1629187929951{margin-top: -70px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.32) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;border-radius: 4px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629187879099{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Funds Paid To Your Account

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

If your application is approved, the loan amount for which you qualify and as requested by you will be paid through electronic fund transfer. No cash payment will be made.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”element_from_fade” css=”.vc_custom_1647078316165{margin-top: -50px !important;}” transition_delay=”200″][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629188564845{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

NO UPFRONT FEES !!!

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Our loans come with only 6% interest from 12 months up to 240 months. You need to confirm this via Debi-Check which will also confirm the correct personal details that will allow us to proceed and speed up the loan process.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/12″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” css=”.vc_custom_1647074695075{border-top-width: 8px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-top-color: #ec1c24 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;}” z_index=””][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629188514279{padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”]

Please note that all our lenders are registered with the NCR. See the below guidelines when applying for a loan:

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”” css=”.vc_custom_1629189053701{padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629188719033{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Implications of Non Payments

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Minimum loan period 12 months Maximum loan period 60 months. Maximum APa

There should only be initial cost if your monthly debit order was unsuccessful as a result of insufficient funds or changing bank accounts without prior notice to the service provider. The service provider will try to contact the client in order to resolve the problem.

If the client can’t be found or the problem can’t be solved, it would be handed over to the internal collections department to see if a solution to the problem can be found. If an agreement can’t be reached, the lender can make use of an external collections company or an attorney.

This will lead to an increase in fees and interest. This will have a big influence on the clients credit score and it will be very difficult to get any more credit from any loan provider.

Monthly premiums for loan repayments will be done by direct debit order collection from the clients bank account. Unsuccessful debit order collections may result in the client being charged a fee by his own bank for the unsuccessful transaction.

R 38% per annum. Representative example: Loan amount R100 000, terms: 36 months APR (Annual Percentage Rate) 28%, monthly service fee R68.40, monthly repayment R4558.00. The interest rate will depend on the loan amount, loan term and credit profile of applicant.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”padding-left-50″ width=”5/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629188669373{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Annual Percentage Rate

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Minimum loan period 12 months Maximum loan period 60 months. Maximum APR 38% per annum. Representative example: Loan amount R100 000, terms: 36 months APR (Annual Percentage Rate) 28%, monthly service fee R68.40, monthly repayment R4558.00. The interest rate will depend on the loan amount, loan term and credit profile of applicant.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629188695702{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Renewal Policy

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]If a client is up to date with his loan repayments, they may qualify for a second or third loan depending on the criteria as set by the loan company. The client will have to apply again and the loan provider will look at the clients profile, affordability, etc. The loan provider will then make a decision based on the rules and regulations as set by the NCR.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” css=”.vc_custom_1647074670807{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ec1c24 !important;}” z_index=””][vc_column css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_column_text]

We Assist Clients Nationwide!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_type=”parallax” parallax_content_width=”in_grid” text_align=”left” full_screen_section_height=”no” background_image=”404″ css=”.vc_custom_1647078032635{background-color: #3f3f3f !important;}” anchor=”read-more”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1629275254498{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=”element_from_bottom” transition_delay=”300″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

To Qualify

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”21px”][vc_column_text]

  • You must be between the ages of 18 and 65
  • Be a permanent SA resident
  • Be permanently employed
  • Your salary must be paid directly into your bank account
  • Your last payslip, or proof of income
  • Proof of home address (up to 3 months old)
  • 3 months’ bank statements

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

How to Improve Your Score

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”21px”][vc_column_text]

  • Make monthly payments on time
  • Don’t miss any credit card payments
  • Pay outstanding balances in full
  • Don’t end up in court for late or non-payment
  • Notify creditors immediately if you can’t make a payment
  • Don’t take out further credit when paying off debt

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column]

Apply today for a Personal Loan up to R10 000 000!

Apply Now!
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
